tags.title: About Remi
tags.description: Remi is a voice teacher at Chameleon Studios and a gospel choir director in Tokyo. Find out more about Remi and Chameleon Studios here.

content.line1: Remi is a classically trained versatile vocalist who has performed in classical choirs in Vienna, a Grammy Award-winning gospel choir, Off Broadway musicals and several jazz clubs in New York City.
content.line2: After graduating from Yokohama International School, she received her Bachelor's in Comparative Literature from Princeton University, where she also received training in French acting.
content.line3a: Back in Tokyo, she has continued classical choral singing and has also performed in live concerts featuring pop/Jpop music. She currently directs a contemporary/gospel choir at
content.line4: Remi was born into a teachers' family and has been teaching for about 15 years. Her teaching experience includes directing a children's program (ages 4+) and training teachers.
content.line5a: Vocal command and agility requires complex inner muscle coordination - and the best way to engage these muscles is by being silly! Her vocal students at
content.line5b: have a wonderful time and her lessons are often the highlight of their week. (Her vocal lessons are most suitable for children ages 8 and up.)
